Twining red-and-white snakes, on a black field

Quartered, yellow sun on a rose-coloured field and white crescents on a blue field

data.name: House Trant
data.coatOfArms:
A black hanged man, on a blue field
(Azure, a hanged man sable)
data.title: Lord of Gallowsgrey

data.name: House Selmy
data.coatOfArms:
Three stalks of yellow wheat, on a brown field
(Tenné, three stalks of wheat or)
data.title: Harvest Hall

data.name: House Mudd
data.coatOfArms:
A golden crown studded with emeralds, on a red-brown field
(Tenné, an ancient crown or studded with emeralds vert)
data.title: King of the Rivers and the Hills

data.name: House Fisher
data.coatOfArms:
A crowned catfish, spotted grey, on a blue field
(Azure, a catfish cendrée, crowned or)
data.title: River king

data.name: House Merlyn
data.coatOfArms: Argent, Twining waterspouts vert

data.name: House Ferren
data.coatOfArms:
Per saltire, checkered red and gold, a silver and black ferret on a green field
(Per saltire chequy gules and or and vert, in each flank point a ferret argent and sable)

data.name: House Slynt
data.coatOfArms:
A bloody gold spear, on a black field, within a checkered gold and black border
(Sable, a spear or, tipped gules, within a bordure chequy of the field and of the second)

data.name: House Ryger
data.coatOfArms:
A green weeping willow, on a white field
(Argent, a willow-tree vert)

data.name: House Broom
data.coatOfArms:
A silver helm crested with a sprig of broom, on a checkered black and green field
(Chequy sable and vert, a helm argent, crested with a sprig of broom proper)

data.name: House Serrett
data.coatOfArms:
A peacock in his pride, on a cream field
(Argent, a peacock-in-his-pride proper)

data.name: House Hersy
data.coatOfArms:
A white winged chalice, on a pink field
(Carnation, a winged cup displayed argent)

data.name: House Baelish
data.coatOfArms:
A grey stone head with fiery eyes, on a light green field
(Vert, a stone head cendrée, orbed gules)

data.name: House Egen
data.coatOfArms:
A yellow sun, white crescent moon, and silver star on a blue chief, above a white field
(Argent, on a chief azure a moon increscent of the first between a sun-in-splendour or and a mullet of the first)

data.name: House Melcolm
data.coatOfArms:
A rusty anchor, on a turquoise field, beneath yellow chief with three blue plates
(Azure, an anchor tenné, on a chief or three hurts)

data.name: House Seaworth
data.coatOfArms:
A black ship on a pale grey field, with a white onion on its sails
(Cendrée, a ship sable, its sail charged with an onion argent)

data.name: House Crane
data.coatOfArms: Azure, cranes in chevron or

data.name: House Webber
data.coatOfArms: Sable, a cobweb argent thereon a spider gules
data.title: Lord of Coldmoat

data.name: House Osgrey
data.coatOfArms: Argent, a lion rampant chequy vert and or
data.title: Marshall of the Northmarch

data.name: House Butterwell
data.coatOfArms:
Barry wavy green, white, and yellow
(Barry wavy vert, argent, and or)

data.name: House Caswell
data.coatOfArms: Argent, a centaur with bow or
data.title: Bitterbridge

data.name: House Leygood
data.coatOfArms: Tenny, three thunderbolts in fess sable

data.name: House Payne
data.coatOfArms:
Gold coins in the checks of a checkered purple and white field
(Chequy purpure and argent, each chequer charged with a bezant)

data.name: House Wylde
data.coatOfArms:
A blue-green maelstrom, on a gold field
(Or, a maelstrom azure)
data.title: Rain House

data.name: House Inchfield
data.coatOfArms: Cendrée, a bend sinister chequy sable and argent

data.name: House Vyrwel
data.coatOfArms: a silver wyvern within a red double tressure on sable

data.name: House Uffering
data.coatOfArms: Paly tenné and cendrée, upon a chief argent seven hands couped vert

data.name: House Poole
data.coatOfArms: White, a roundel azure, a tressure cendrée

data.name: House Rambton
data.coatOfArms: Gules, a ram's head cabossed argent attired or

data.name: House Myatt
data.coatOfArms:
A spotted yellow-and-black treecat, on a mud-brown field
(Tenné, a treecat or pelleté)

data.name: House Staunton
data.coatOfArms: two black wings upon a white fess on checkered black and grey

data.name: House Farring
data.coatOfArms: Per pale purpure and argent, two knights combatant crossing swords counterchanged

data.name: House Lorch
data.coatOfArms:
A black manticore on a white field, beneath a crimson chief with three gold coins
(Argent, a manticore passant sable, on a chief gules three bezants)

data.name: House Bywater
data.coatOfArms:
Blue frets on a white field, three silver fish on a blue chief
(Argent fretty azure, on a chief of the second three fish of the field)

data.name: House Thorne
data.coatOfArms: Gules, a flail argent within an bordure rayonne sable

data.name: House Varner
data.coatOfArms: Ermines, a weasel argent

data.name: House Mollen
data.coatOfArms: White, upon a pile vert a snowy pine tree proper

data.name: House Willum
data.coatOfArms: three silver longswords crossed on black beneath a dragonbone skeleton on a white chief

data.name: House Shermer
data.coatOfArms: a field of copper nails on blue, a copper border rayonne

data.name: House Blackbar
data.coatOfArms: Argent, a fess sable
data.title: Lord of Bandallon

data.name: House Dunn
data.coatOfArms: per pale black and pink, a countercharged two-headed pelican

data.name: House Rykker
data.coatOfArms: Azure, a cross saltire argent charged with two crossed warhammers sable
data.title: Duskendale

data.name: House Footly
data.coatOfArms: a field of silver caltrops on black

data.name: House Wythers
data.coatOfArms: a grey squirrel on white with red border

data.name: House Falwell
data.coatOfArms:
A fool in red and gold motley juggling five suns, on a black field
(Sable, a fool proper clothed in motley gules and or, juggling five suns-in-splendour of the last)

data.name: House Smallwood
data.coatOfArms:
Six brown acorns, on a yellow field
(Or, six acorns, 3, 2, 1, tenné)
data.title: Acorn Hall

data.name: House Bettley
data.coatOfArms:
Three blue beetles, on a gold field
(Or, three beetles azure)

data.name: House Kenning of Kayce
data.coatOfArms:
Four sunbursts counterchanged on a quartered orange and black field
(Quarterly tenné and sable, four suns-in-splendour counterchanged)
data.title: Lord of Kayce

data.name: House Peckledon
data.coatOfArms:
Ten purple stars, on a yellow field
(Or, ten mullets, 4, 3, 2, 1, purpure)

data.name: House Foote
data.coatOfArms:
A copper dagger across a black chevron, on a white field
(Argent, a chevron reversed sable, surmounted by a dagger erect tenné)

data.name: House Sarsfield
data.coatOfArms:
A green arrow on a white bend, on a green field
(Vert, on a bend argent an arrow of the field, point to dexter chief)

data.name: House Grell
data.coatOfArms:
Three red martlets on a white bend, on a blue field
(Azure, on a bend argent three martlets gules)

data.name: House Wayn
data.coatOfArms:
Four wheels counterchanged on a quartered blue and white field
(Quarterly azure and argent, four wheels counterchanged)

data.name: House Meadows
data.coatOfArms: a border of flowers of many colors and varieties on green
data.title: Grassy Vale

data.name: House Kettleblack
data.coatOfArms: Gules, a kettle within an orle sable

data.name: House Blount
data.coatOfArms:
A red bend sinister between two black porcupines, on a green field
(Vert, a bend sinister gules between two porcupines sable)

data.name: House Vance of Wayfarer's Rest
data.coatOfArms:
Quartered, a black dragon on a white field and two golden eyes in a golden ring on a black field
(Quarterly, first and fourth, argent, a dragon sable, second and third, sable, a pair of eyes within an annulet or)

data.name: House Yarwyck
data.coatOfArms:
Two bronze halberds crossed between four red diamonds, on a white field
(Argent, two halberds saltirewise tenné, hafted sable, between four lozenges gules)

data.name: House Mallery
data.coatOfArms: Purpure, six mullets argent

data.name: House Erenford
data.coatOfArms:
A golden heron, beak and legs black, standing with a silver fish in its beak, on a pink field
(Carnation, a heron or, beaked and membered sable, clasped in its mouth a fish argent)

data.name: House Hollard
data.coatOfArms: Barry gules and carnation, a chief azure with three crowns Or

data.name: House Goodbrother of Crow Spike Keep
House Haigh
data.coatOfArms:
A black pitchfork on a gold bend sinister, on a russet field
(Tenné, on a bend sinister or a pitchfork sable)

data.name: House Baelish of Harrenhal
data.coatOfArms:
A field of silver mockingbirds, on a green field
(Vert, semé of mockingbirds argent)
data.title: Lord Paramount of the Trident

data.name: House Norcross
data.coatOfArms: Argent, a cross embattled sable

data.name: House Bolling
data.coatOfArms:
Vairy orange and blue, upon a black canton, a golden stag beneath an orange bend sinister
(Vairy tenné and azure, on a canton sable a stag or debruised by a bend sinister of the first)

data.name: House Hardyng
data.coatOfArms:
A field of red and white diamonds
(Lozengy argent and gules)

data.name: House Hawick
data.coatOfArms:
White seabirds strewn across a blue field
(Azure, semé of seabirds argent)

data.name: House Hasty
data.coatOfArms:
A white bend cotised, on a purple field
(Purpure, a bend cotised argent)

data.name: House Cockshaw
data.coatOfArms: Sable, three feathers in fess gules argent and or

data.name: House Vypren
data.coatOfArms:
A black toad on white lily pad, on a green field
(Vert, a toad sable atop a lilypad argent)

data.name: House Blanetree
data.coatOfArms:
Green and brown maple leaves, strewn across a yellow field
(Or, semé of maple leaves vert and tenné)

data.name: House Ashford
data.coatOfArms: Tenny, a sun in splendour beneath a chevron inverted argent
data.title: Ashford

data.name: House Peake
data.coatOfArms: Tenny, three castles sable
data.title: Starpike

data.name: House Ball
data.coatOfArms: Three white plates upon a chevron red on a white field

data.name: House Rhysling
data.coatOfArms: An oaken door banded with iron, in a grey stone doorway, on black masonry

data.name: House Shawney
data.coatOfArms:
Per fesse, a divided blue, red, green field above, a white catfish on a black field below
(Per fesse, the first tierced in pale azure, gules and vert, the second sable, a catfish argent)

data.name: House Lonmouth
data.coatOfArms:
Quartered of six: red lips strewn on a yellow field, yellow skulls strewn on a black field
(Quarterly of six, first, third and fifth, or, semé of lips gules, second, fourth and sixth, sable, semé of skulls of the first)

data.name: House Chelsted
data.coatOfArms:
Per bend green and white shield, a spiked mace and a silver dagger crossed
(Per bend vert and argent, in pale a mace surmounted by a dagger in fesse of the second)

data.name: House Byrch
data.coatOfArms:
Gryonny white and black quartered with a silver axe on a green field
(Quarterly, first and fourth, gyronny argent and sable, second and third, vert, an axe palewise argent)

data.name: House Turnberry
data.coatOfArms:
Nine strawberries on a white saltire, on a field of green and red vairy in point
(Vairy-in-point vert and gules, on a saltire argent nine strawberries of the second)

data.name: House Spicer
data.coatOfArms:
Three black pepperpots on a saffron bend, across a field of green and silver stripes
(Paly vert and argent, three pepperpots sable on a bend tenné)
data.title: Lord of Castamere

data.name: House Graceford
data.coatOfArms: Tenny, on a pale wavy argent the Mother's face proper

data.name: House Grandison
data.coatOfArms:
A black sleeping lion, on a yellow field
(Or, a lion dormant sable)
data.title: Lord of Grandview

data.name: House Toyne
data.coatOfArms:
A black winged heart, on a gold field, within a black embattled border
Or, a winged heart within a bordure embattled sable)

data.name: House Lychester
data.coatOfArms:
A black talon, on an orange and white gyronny field
(Gyronny tenné and argent, an eagle's leg erased sable)

data.name: House Charlton
data.coatOfArms:
Three sprigs of mistletoe, green and red, on a gold field within a green border
(Or, three sprigs of mistletoe vert, fructed gules, within a bordure of the second)

data.name: House Roote
data.coatOfArms:
A brown double-headed horse on a field of wavy green and green
(Wavy vert and vert, a two-headed horse tenné)

data.name: House Risley
data.coatOfArms: A black knight on a black rearing horse on white, bearing a golden lance and a white shield, upon which is seen the above in miniature

data.name: House Massey
data.coatOfArms: A triple spiral; red, green and blue, on white
data.title: Stonedance

data.name: House Cafferen
data.coatOfArms:
Two white fawns counter salient, on a green field
(Vert, two fawns counter-salient argent)

data.name: House Stout
data.coatOfArms: Chevronny tenné and Or
data.title: Goldgrass

data.name: House Follard
data.coatOfArms: Gyronny gules and argent, on a canton Or a fool's cap two peaked of the first and second

data.name: House Harte
data.coatOfArms: Three red hart's heads caboshed on a white bend on vair

data.name: House Harroway
data.coatOfArms:
Per bend sinister orange and sable rayonné, a castle counterchanged
(Per bend sinister rayonné tenné and sable, a castle counterchanged)
data.title: Harrenhal

data.name: House Magnar
data.coatOfArms: Argent, a lobster vert holding a harpoon sable

data.name: House Gower
data.coatOfArms:
Nine yellow trefoils on a black cross, on an ermine field
(Ermine, on a cross sable nine trefoils or)

data.name: House Brune of Brownhollow
data.coatOfArms: Argent, a bear's paw erased within a double tressure tenné
data.title: Knight

data.name: House Gaunt
data.coatOfArms: Purpure, three lances palewise in fess between two flaunches sable

data.name: House Wensington
data.coatOfArms:
Two golden trumpets crossed on a blue field, beneath a gold chief with three black stags
(Azure, two trumpets saltirewise or, on a chief of the second three stags salient sable)

data.name: House Brune of the Dyre Den
data.title: Dyre Den

data.name: House Cressey
data.coatOfArms:
Seven silver coins on a red bend sinister, between two silver helmets, on a blue field
(Azure, on a bend sinister gules seven plates, between two helmets argent)

data.name: House Edgerton
data.coatOfArms: Purpure, a wheel flaming tenny quartered with half-fusilly sable and argent

data.name: House Langward
data.coatOfArms: Per fess undy: A crown of white stars on burgundy above black

data.name: House Pyle
data.coatOfArms: A grey iron greathelm on white

data.name: House Wendwater
data.coatOfArms: A green engrailed pall, inverted on white, dividing three trees, green, red and bare

data.name: House Manning
data.coatOfArms: A red sea lion between two black pallets on white

data.name: House Rollingford
data.coatOfArms: Six roundels fountain, 3-2-1, on grey

data.name: House Condon
data.coatOfArms: An eagle's head between crossed tridents, red on white

data.name: House Ironsmith
data.coatOfArms: Or, a sword palewise between four horseshoes sable all within a bordure vert

data.name: House Lightfoot
data.coatOfArms: Tenny, a trail of footprints in bend sinister argent

data.name: House Moss
data.coatOfArms: A bend orange on vairy grey and green

data.name: House Fenn
data.coatOfArms: Purpure, three water lilies sable

data.name: House Lake (north)
data.coatOfArms: Tenny, seven pommes arranged 2-2-2-1

data.name: House Overton
data.coatOfArms: Sable, a fess chequy argent and Or

data.name: House Waterman
data.coatOfArms: Argent, two oars saltirewise tenny between as many flaunces azure

data.name: House Slate
data.coatOfArms: Pale grey, a double tressure white

data.name: House Woolfield
data.coatOfArms: Three woolsacks, white on purple, a white border

data.name: House Wells (north)
data.coatOfArms: Per fess cendrée and lozengy argent and vert, in chief five pellets

data.name: House Whitehill
data.coatOfArms: A white pile inverted on indigo, an arch of 4-pointed stars above

data.name: House Crowl
data.coatOfArms: Pily gules and sable

data.name: House Stane
data.coatOfArms: A driftwood tree, bare and brown, on pale green

data.name: House Myre
data.coatOfArms: 10 nooses, 4-3-2-1, black on white with a border of blood

data.name: House Kenning of Harlaw
data.coatOfArms: Sable, issuant from a cloud bank in chief the Storm God's hand cendrée with lightning flashing from its fingertip Or

data.name: House Norridge
data.coatOfArms: Azure, six arrows in bend sable heads flaming gules

data.name: House Farwynd of the Lonely Light
data.coatOfArms: Per fess wavy tenny and sable, a demi-torteaux gules issuant from the division surmounted by a longship sailing upon the division of the second

data.name: House Qoherys
data.coatOfArms:
A flaming red and yellow saltire between four white skulls, on a black field
(Sable, a saltire rayonné gules, tipped or, between four skulls argent)
data.title: Harrenhal

data.name: House Teague
data.coatOfArms:
A golden trident upright between two golden flanches, on a black field
(Sable, between two flaunches a trident erect or)
data.title: King of the Trident

data.name: House Justman
data.coatOfArms:
Golden scales within a blue a double tressure, on a white field
(Argent, a pair of balances or within a double-tressure azure)
data.title: King of the Trident

data.name: House Towers of Harrenhal
data.coatOfArms:
Five black towers within a red and black double tressure, on a white field
(Argent, five towers sable within a double-tressure, the outer gules and the inner of the second)

data.name: House Strong
data.coatOfArms:
A tripartite pale, blue, red, and green, on a white field
(Argent, a pale tierced per pale azure, gules, and vert)
data.title: Harrenhal

data.name: House Keath
data.coatOfArms:
Quarterly of nine; a white fish on a grey field; a gold fish hook on a white field
(Quarterly of nine, first, third, fifth, seventh and ninth cendrée, a fish argent; second, fourth, sixth and eight argent, a fish-hook or)

data.name: House Lolliston
data.coatOfArms:
Three oaken barrels, on a white field
(Argent, three oaken barrels proper)

data.name: House Donniger
data.coatOfArms:
A red sun rising from a grey-green sea, against a yellow sky
(Per fesse wavy or and vert-cendrée, a demi-sun-in-splendour issuant from the line of division gules)

data.name: House Terrick
data.coatOfArms:
Per saltire purple and gold, four hawks' heads countercharged
(Per saltire purpure and or, four hawks' heads counterchanged)

data.name: House Wode
data.coatOfArms:
Three white hedgehogs, on a yellow field
(Or, three hedgehogs argent)

data.name: House Elesham
data.coatOfArms:
A black star between an inverted stone-coloured double-pile, on a pink field
(Carnation, a mullet sable between two piles issuant from base cendrée)

data.name: House Pryor
data.coatOfArms:
A partial eclipse, black moon over yellow sun, on a dusty pink field
(Carnation, a sun-in-splendour or surmounted by a moon in her complement sable)

data.name: House Ruthermont
data.coatOfArms:
Five black starfish on a gold pale, on a field of pean
(Pean, on a pale or five starfish sable)

data.name: House Upcliff
data.coatOfArms:
A cresting sea-green wave, on a black field
(Sable, a wave cresting vert)

data.name: House Shett of Gull Tower
data.coatOfArms:
Three golden wings, bendwise, on a checkered white and black field
(Chequy argent and sable, in bend three dexter wings elevated bendwise or)
data.title: the Knight of Gull Tower

data.name: House Wydman
data.coatOfArms:
Five splintered lances, 3, 2, striped blue and white with blue pennons, on a yellow field, beneath a white chief bearing a red castle, a green viper, a black broken wheel, a purple unicorn and a yellow lion
(Or, five broken lances, 3, 2, striped azure and argent, pennons of the second, on a chief of the third, a wheel broken sable between, on the dexter, a castle gules and snake vert, and, on the sinister, a unicorn rampant purpure and lion rampant of the field)

data.name: House Wagstaff
data.coatOfArms:
Five yellow mascles, on a green field
(Vert, five mascles in fess or)

data.name: House Algood
data.coatOfArms:
A golden wreath, on a blue field with a gold border
(Azure, a garland of laurel within a bordure or)

data.name: House Garner
data.coatOfArms:
Three grey owls upon white plates, on a green field
(Vert, three plates, each charged with an owl close affronté cendrée)

data.name: House Appleton
data.coatOfArms: Or, an apple tree eradicated proper fructed gules, quartered with argent, a gatehouse cendrée

data.name: House Doggett
data.coatOfArms:
Per bend, a white unicorn on a green field, a black raven on a white field
(Per bend vert and argent, in sinister chief a unicorn rampant of the second, and in dexter base a raven closed sable)

data.name: House Hamell
data.coatOfArms:
An erminois maunch, on a pink field with an erminois border
(Carnation, a maunch within a bordure erminois)

data.name: House Bridges
data.coatOfArms: A black stone bridge with three arches upon a golden chief above three blue pallets on white

data.name: House Cordwayner
data.coatOfArms: Lozengny vert and or, a pair of boots sable

data.name: House Drox
data.coatOfArms:
Three black crossbows, on a gold field with a black border
(Or, three crossbows within a bordure sable)

data.name: House Graves
data.coatOfArms: Green and white gyronny, a double-headed eagle counter-charged, gold beak and talons

data.name: House Kidwell
data.coatOfArms: Cendrée masoned sable, semy of ivy leaves vert

data.name: House Bushy
data.coatOfArms: A green fess embattled on white

data.name: House Hastwyck
data.coatOfArms: Barry olive and ivory

data.name: House Hutcheson
data.coatOfArms: Or, two bendlets between in base dexter a hand pointing to chief sinister, and in chief sinister a sun in splendour gules

data.name: House Lyberr
data.coatOfArms: Per bend sinister: a grey cat's face on black, a brown jug on white

data.name: House Lowther
data.coatOfArms: A silver dolphin on a blue-green field

data.name: House Middlebury
data.coatOfArms: Quarterly, a black saltire on yellow, green and white diamonds

data.name: House Redding
data.coatOfArms: Gules, a flagon Or within a bordure chequy Or and argent

data.name: House Oldflowers
data.coatOfArms: Vert, ten hands couped argent surmounted by a bend sinister gules

data.name: House Orme
data.coatOfArms: Per fess sable and bendy Or and argent, in chief three harps in fess of the seocnd

data.name: House Roxton
data.coatOfArms: Bleu celeste, per saltire a chain of rings Or

data.name: House Pommingham
data.coatOfArms: A red pomegranate on white, a double tressure red

data.name: House Sloane
data.coatOfArms: Per pale, white stars strewn on indigo, an orange sun on yellow

data.name: House Woodwright
data.coatOfArms: A red pall on a field of oak

data.name: House Westbrook
data.coatOfArms: Two green bars gemmel on gold

data.name: House Yelshire
data.coatOfArms: Barry vert and Or, on a chief sable a battering-ram proper headed Or

data.name: House Horpe
data.coatOfArms:
Per chevron engrailed grey and bone, three death's head moths counterchanged
(Per chevron reversed engrailed cendrée and argent, three death's head moths counterchanged)

data.name: House Kellington
data.coatOfArms:
A black book bound in bronze, locked, on a pale blue field
(Azure, a locked book sable, edged and garnished tenné)

data.name: House Herston
data.coatOfArms:
A yellow rooster's head with red comb, within a white escutcheon, on a red field
(Gules, on an escutcheon argent, a cock's head or, combed and wattled of the field)

data.name: House Peasebury
data.coatOfArms:
A green pea pod, burst open, on a white field, bordered by three rows of green peas
(Argent, a pea pod open within a bordure of three rows of peas vert)
data.title: Lord of Poddingfield

data.name: House Musgood
data.coatOfArms:
Quarterly: A golden pavilion on a blue field, a green laurel crown on a white field
(Quarterly, first and fourth, azure, a pavilion or, second and third, argent, a garland of laurel vert)

data.name: House Mertyns
data.coatOfArms:
A white great horned owl on a grey field
(Cendrée, a great-horned owl close affronté argent)

data.name: House Tudbury
data.coatOfArms:
A brown tortoise within a yellow lozenge, on a green field
(Vert, on a lozenge or a tortoise tergiant tenné)

data.name: House Swygert
data.coatOfArms:
A white scroll with gold knobs, on a purple field within a white tressure
(Purpure a scroll argent, knobbed or, within a tressure of the second)

data.name: House Hunt
data.coatOfArms: Argent, a deer bound and slung on a pole fesswise tenny

data.name: House Cole
data.coatOfArms:
Ten black pellets, on a scarlet field
(Gules, ten pellets, 4, 3, 2, 1)

data.name: House Rogers
data.coatOfArms:
Nine silver unicorns around a silver maze, on a black field
(Sable, a maze surrounded by an orle of nine unicorns rampant argent)

data.name: House Westford
data.coatOfArms: A black dog on blue

data.name: House Forrester
data.coatOfArms: an ironwood tree outline with a sword outline drawn inside it, pointing down. (Telltale)

data.name: House Thenn
data.coatOfArms: Argent, a sun in splendour gules
data.title: Magnar of Thenn

data.name: House Mandrake
data.coatOfArms: unknown

data.name: House Harlaw of Grey Garden
data.coatOfArms: Quartered: a silver scythe on black, a peacock on cream
data.title:
Knight of Grey Garden
Lord of Greyshield

data.name: House Lannister of Darry
data.coatOfArms:
Quarterly, a gold lion on a red field; a black plowman on a brown field
(Quarterly, first and fourth gules a lion rampant or (for Lannister), second and third tenné a plowman sable (for Darry))
data.title: Lord of Darry

data.name: House Harlaw of Harlaw Hall
data.coatOfArms: Per bend black and silver, two scythes counterchanged
data.title: Master of Harlaw Hall

data.name: House Durrandon
data.coatOfArms:
A black crowned stag, on a gold field
(Or, a stag salient, crowned, sable)
data.title: Storm King

data.name: House Harlaw of the Tower of Glimmering
data.coatOfArms: The Harlaw scythe girdled within an embattled border.
data.title: Master of the Tower of Glimmering

data.name: House Goode
data.coatOfArms: Unknown

data.name: House Harlaw of Harridan Hill
data.coatOfArms: the Harlaw scythe on a pale blue field
data.title: Master of Harridan Hill

data.name: House Hawthorne
data.coatOfArms:
A ring of black thorns and a ring of pink flowers, interlocked, on a green field
(Vert, two interlocking annulets, one composed of thorns sable, the other of flowers carnation)

data.name: House Fisher of the Stony Shore
House Belgrave
data.coatOfArms: unknown

data.name: House Penny
data.coatOfArms: Unknown

data.name: House Shett of Gulltown
data.coatOfArms:
Nine white seagulls on a field of brown
(Tenné, nine seagulls argent, 3, 3, 2, 1)

data.name: House Breakstone
data.coatOfArms: A red sledge

data.name: House Lipps
data.coatOfArms:
Two large pink lips, on a dark blue field
(Azure, a pair of lips carnation)

data.name: House Harlton
data.coatOfArms: A silver tree on green

data.name: House Sarwyck
data.coatOfArms: A broken silver sword on red

data.name: The House of Black and White
House Bolton of Winterfell
data.coatOfArms: A red flayed man on pink de sang
data.title: Lord of Winterfell
